text: Nɨbi bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbop takaw agɨnɨgebin. Yad abe bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdep olap mɨdebin. Klays yul dɨl kumak ñɨn ak, yad nɨg yenek. Pen Klays ne bɨawl mɨlek sek yɨb awl sek adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, chɨn jɨmñɨl Klays ayɨp yonɨgabun. Anɨb ak yad nɨbi bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdebɨm okok kɨles gɨl agebin.
